entities.name: deatheaters
entities.description: A group of people standing in a specific location, watching. ("where the Deat h Eaters stood watching")

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: One of the Death Eaters, who is being ordered to untie someone and return their wand. ("Wormtail, an d give him back his wand.")

relationships.description: Wormtail is a member of the group of Death Eaters. ("Now untie him, Wormtail...", implying that Wormtail is part of the group being addressed.)
